infoPlist.NSRemindersUsageDescription: This app uses your calendar to find overlapping availability between groups of friends
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app uses the camera to let people upload profile pictures
infoPlist.NSContactsUsageDescription: This app uses contacts to let you easily add your friends
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app uses the photo library to let people upload profile pictures
